ReferenceDocuments.name: The Relational and Item-Speci
ReferenceDocuments.description: The Relational and Item-Specific Encoding Task (RiSE) is a computerized test, developed in Eprime by the Cognitive Neuroscience Test Reliability and Clinical applications for Schizophrenia (CNTRACS) consortium, which evaluates item-specific encoding and relational encoding.
